CustomField.description: Will define in MILESTONES_APEX how many invoices will be inserted. User enters value on LWC INSERT_MILESTONES_LWC for ProjectType__c = 'Time & Materials', 'Managed Services' or 'Maintenance' .
CustomField.inlineHelpText: States how many invoices will be generated out of the milestones. Per Milestone one invoice is generated. Must be filled for project type "Time & Materials", "Managed Services" and "Maintenance".
CustomField.label: Number Invoices
